truths.title: On Perspective
truths.quote: We are not IN the universe, we ARE the universe. An intrinsic part of it. Ultimately you are not a person, but a focal point where the universe is becoming conscious of itself.

truths.title: On Knowledge
truths.quote: The universe is under no obligation to make sense to you. The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.

truths.title: On Time
truths.quote: The distinction between past, present, and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion. Time is a flat circle, and we are all characters within it.

truths.title: On Existence
truths.quote: You are a ghost driving a meat-coated skeleton made of stardust, riding a rock hurtling through space. Fear nothing.

truths.title: On Self
truths.quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop. Look within, for that is where everything resides.
